articles.title: Enlarged Meeting of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK Held
articles.content:
Enlarged Meeting of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK Held
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- An enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) took place in Pyongyang Wednesday under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the WPK, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					 Attending the meeting were members and alternate members of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 Present there as observers were vice-premiers of the Cabinet, department directors and first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee, section chiefs of relevant departments, chief secretaries of the provincial committees of the WPK and leading officials of commissions, ministries, national institutions, working people's organizations and armed forces organs.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of Kim Jong Il, general secretary of the WPK and eternal leader of the party and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 A resolution of the enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee was adopted there.
					
					 1. On implementing the behests of leader Kim Jong Il to the last, regarding them as eternal guidelines of our party and the revolution.
					
					 2. On organizational matter.
					
					 The meeting discussed the first agenda item.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae made a report on the first agenda item.
					
					 The reporter reviewed the work done for the past three years to implement the behests of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He said the past three years were a period in which the army and people of the DPRK waged a dynamic struggle to thoroughly implement the behests of Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Kim Jong Un and years of victories and changes that demonstrated the great attraction and vitality of Kim Jong Il's idea and cause all over the world.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The eternity and invincibility of Kim Il Sung's nation and Kim Jong Il's Korea were demonstrated to the whole world and signal achievements assuring the bright future of the great Paektusan nation were achieved. These are entirely ascribable to the wise guidance provided by Kim Jong Un who is unconditionally implementing to the letter without an inch of deflection or a step of concession the behests of Kim Jong Il, regarding them as important guidelines.
					
					 The reporter said that shortcomings were manifested in the work for implementing the behests of Kim Jong Il over the past three years, calling for bringing about a radical turn in implementing the behests of Kim Jong Il by improving their ideological viewpoint and work style and manner.
					
					 Speeches were made by Pak Pong Ju, Ri Jae Il, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Chun Sop, Ri Man Gon and Jon Yong Nam on the first agenda item.
					
					 The speakers made analysis of the achievements and shortcomings made in their own sectors and units and lessons drawn from them in the work to implement the behests of Kim Jong Il over the last three years. 
					
					 The meeting adopted a resolution on the first agenda item "On Holding Fast to Behests of the Great Comrade Kim Jong Il as Eternal Guidelines for Our Party and Revolution and Carrying Them out to the Last".
					
					 The behests of Kim Jong Il, great image of the powerful Paektusan nation and eternal leader of the WPK and the Korean people, serve as a textbook of the Korean revolution and scientific and encyclopedic important guidelines that indicate the way of building a thriving socialist nation and winning the final victory of the Juche revolution, the resolution said, and went on: 
					
					 Kim Jong Un is showing in practice how the behests of Kim Jong Il should be upheld and translated into reality.
					
					 Reflecting the revolutionary faith and will and ardent desire of the army and people of the DPRK, Kim Jong Un made sure that Kim Jong Il was held forever in high esteem at the top post of the WPK and the state and the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun was remodeled on the noblest level as the sacred temple of Juche and that statues of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il were erected on Mansu Hill and in provincial seats and major units, thus making their beaming images shine all over the country.
					
					 Kim Jong Un resolutely laid bare and foiled the moves of the modern-day factional elements who challenged the monolithic leadership of the party, thus putting the ideological oneness of the entire party and the whole society on the highest level and bringing the flower garden of the single-minded unity into full bloom by carrying forward Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's noble outlook on the people and the rising generation.
					
					 While putting forward the KPA as the reliable pioneers party and strong buttress upholding the Songun revolutionary cause of the party in the van, Kim Jong Un developed it into the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army capable of defeating enemy's provocation at a single stroke, built world-class edifices through army-people coordinated operations and brought about a shining victory in the struggle for building an economic power and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 The resolution called for conducting the work for implementing the behests of Kim Jong Il as the primary tasks and unconditionally carrying out them to the last without an inch of deflection and a single step of concession.
					
					 It underscored the need for the party organizations to conduct an intensive political and ideological offensive for giving full play to the mental power of the masses in implementing the behests of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The resolution called for making sure that all efforts are channeled into the implementation of his behests to thoroughly establish the monolithic leadership system of Kim Jong Un and uphold and preserve the leadership exploits of the party and add brilliance to them. 
					
					 It underlined the need to unconditionally carry out the behests of Kim Jong Il to the letter by tenaciously pushing forward the work till their vitality is displayed in practice.
					
					 It called on the officials, commanding cadres of the revolution, to be standard bearers and vanguard fighters in the all-out charge for devotedly implementing the behests of Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 The resolution stressed the need to wage an all-party intensive campaign against abuse of power, bureaucratism, irregularities and corruption.
					
					 It underscored the need for the officials to dedicate themselves to the party and revolution, society and the collective and take it as due revolutionary ethics and revolutionary party discipline to work and live simple-mindedly, uprightly and honestly as intended by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It underlined the need for the officials to devote their blood and sweat to solving knotty problems in the people's living and difficult problems of people, deeply aware of the noble intention of Kim Jong Un who is dedicating himself to the people. 
					
					 The resolution called on the party organizations and political bodies at all levels, the Cabinet and the relevant organs to conduct organizational and political work and take administrative and working measures to implement the above-said resolution.
					
					 The meeting discussed the organizational issue, the second agenda item.
					
					 Kim Jong Un made a historic conclusion at the meeting.
					
					 He said that the meeting which was held at the important historic period of the Korean revolution reviewed the achievements, experience and shortcomings made in the struggle to carry out the behests of Kim Jong Il and lessons drawn from them and discussed and decided on important issues arising in successfully carrying out his behests.
					
					 Through the past three-year-long struggle to carry out the behests of Kim Jong Il we deeply cherished the unshakable faith that the lines and policies set forth by him and his teachings are textbooks of revolution and if we work as taught by him, there is  nothing impossible and the final victory belongs to us, Kim Jong Un said.
					
					 He noted that it is the fixed will of the WPK and the army and people of the DPRK to implement to the letter Kim Jong Il's behests without an inch of deflection and without a step of concession and translate his plan and desire into a reality on this land.
					
					 He called for wage a dynamic struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and accomplish the historic cause of national reunification under the unfurled banner of great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 He said we should do all work as intended by Kim Jong Il and as he did, regarding his behests as the important guidelines as befitting his faithful soldiers and disciples.
					
					 Party organizations should conduct the organizational and political work in a fresh and viable manner so that the officials, party members and working people may turn out as one with the revolutionary faith, fighting spirit and revolutionary pluck to devotedly carry out the teachings of Kim Jong Il and the party's policies under any condition, Kim Jong Un noted.
					
					 All party organizations should put on record without omission all the teachings and instructions Kim Jong Il gave to their domains and units, bring them home to officials and other working people and thus help them deeply grasp his behests, he said.
					
					 The party organizations should wage unique and dynamic political work pulsating with the breath of the times and motivate the people so that the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu, the spirit of blizzards of Paektu prevail throughout the country and a high-pitched drive for creation and innovation is waged in all worksites, he said, and went on:
					
					 Units associated with the leadership of Kim Jong Il should take the lead in implementing his behests to the letter.
					
					 Noting that it was the most important behest sand lifetime desire of Kim Jong Il to provide the people with an affluent and happy life, Kim Jong Un said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's behests concerning the problems of food and clothing essential for the living should be carried out before any other behests.
					
					 The leading officials of the party and the state and all other officials should look back with conscience whether they have worked as required by the revolution and in its interests true to the intention of Kim Jong Il at the important posts entrusted to them by the party, and work with their sleeves rolled up to thoroughly carry out his behests and party policies with extraordinary resolution and enthusiasm.
					
					 Not a few officials including those of economic guidance organs lack responsibilities in their work and fail to fulfill their role as masters.
					
					 He urged the officials to conceive from a fresh angle and wage in an innovative way all work with their feet planted in reality and looking at the world.
					
					 He called the officials to work and live simple-mindedly, uprightly and honestly with conscience.
					
					 All domains and units should judge well whether any work is contrary to the people's demand and interests and do the work without their burden and inconvenience, he said.
					
					 He noted that there is nothing impossible and there is insurmountable fortress as long as there is the bright blueprint for building a rich and powerful country indicated by Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary enthusiasm and great strength of all service personnel and people who are turning out as one in the revolutionary spirit of Paektu true to the call of the party.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers are making desperate efforts to block our advance but the Korean revolution is dynamically advancing along the landmark of victory set by the party, he said.
					
					 He called on all the people to uphold the spirit of the enlarged meeting of the Political Bureau of the WPK Central Committee and bring about a revolutionary turn in the struggle to implement the behests of Kim Jong Il, confident of victory.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Message to Venezuelan President
articles.content:
Solidarity Voiced with Venezuelan Government and People
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message to Nicolas Maduro Moros, president of the Bolivarian Republic of Venezuela, on Wednesday as regards the fact that the military coup planned by the reactionaries at home under the manipulation of the U.S. was recently disclosed and shattered in Venezuela.
					 Kim in his message extended support and firm solidarity to the president, government and people of Venezuela.
					
					 Accusing the U.S. of its interference in other's internal affairs and moves of creating uneasiness across the world including Venezuela, he reaffirmed the will of the government and people of the DPRK to always stand with the government and people of Venezuela struggling for defending the country's sovereignty, ensuring its peace and stability and improving the people's living standard.
					
					 Expressing belief that the Venezuelan people's cause of justice would certainly triumph under the leadership of the president, Kim wished the president bigger success in his responsible work.

articles.title: Ri Su Yong Sends Message to Venezuelan FM
articles.content:
Ri Su Yong Sends Message to Venezuelan FM
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The DPRK foreign minister Wednesday sent a message to the foreign minister of people's power in support of the Venezuelan government for foiling the military coup attempted by the anti-government forces under the U.S. manipulation.
					 Strongly condemning the Washington-backed military coup designed to overthrow the legitimate Venezuelan government, the message extended firm solidarity to the government and people of Venezuela in their efforts to defend the sovereignty, peace and stability of the country and improve the people's living standard.
					
					 Reiterating the DPRK's stand of supporting the just cause of the Venezuelan people, it wished the foreign minister good health and greater success in his work.

articles.title: DPRK FM Denounces US "Human Rights" Racket
articles.content:
DPRK FM Denounces US "Human Rights" Racket
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK Thursday made public the following statement denouncing the U.S. for making desperate efforts to fan up the atmosphere of pressure upon the DPRK while taking issue with it over the non-existent "human rights" issue:
					 In Washington on Feb. 17 the U.S. held a "conference on human rights" against the DPRK under the absurd pretext of the first anniversary of the "report of the UN Commission of Inquiry" (COI) on the human rights situation in the DPRK. 
					
					 It was reported that the U.S. staged a farce malignantly slandering the DPRK, repeating the tattered false data, with the "envoy for the human rights issue in north Korea" in the U.S. Department of State, former and incumbent persons of the department and U.S. Congress, the former chairman of the COI and its "special rapporteur" and "defectors from the north" attending.
					
					 It has already been brought to light that the "report of COI" and the "human rights resolution" of the UN General Assembly which were cooked up by the U.S. last year were forcibly adopted on the basis of the false testimonies of "defectors from the north". 
					
					 The inhuman tortures by the CIA of the U.S. and other human rights abuses in the U.S. were disclosed, sparking off big astonishment and resentment of the international community. 
					
					 The U.S., driven into the tight corner at home and abroad, is kicking up the persistent "human rights" racket against the DPRK in order to escape its poor plight and shift the international accusations and attack onto others. 
					
					 Great irony is that the U.S. held the nonsensical "conference on human rights" while dreaming of "internal disorganization" though it admitted itself that it has no chance to win military standoff with the DPRK.
					
					 As we did at the time when the U.S. held a "meeting of high-ranking officials on human rights in north Korea" before the UN General Assembly last year, we strongly demanded this time the U.S. stop at once such foolish farce and officially informed it of our just stand to take part in the "conference" as the party concerned. 
					
					 However, the U.S. finally refused to accept our demand only to reveal itself that the "conference" is nothing but a back-street one. 
					
					 If the U.S. and its allied forces are truly interested in human rights, they should mind their own business by halting plot-breeding racket such as "conference" and their human rights abuses such as tortures in the U.S. and suppression on charges of the violation of the "Security Law" in south Korea, condemned by the world. 
					
					 The ceaseless despicable anti-DPRK "human rights" racket by the U.S. and its stooges is hardening the will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to annihilate the enemies. 
					
					 We are fully ready for any confrontation with the U.S. and will shatter the reckless "human rights" racket by the hostile forces through our toughest reaction.
					
					 The moves of the hostile forces to dare provoke the socialist system of the DPRK which was chosen and has been consolidated by the Korean people will not be able to escape disgraceful doom.

articles.title: Message of Greeting from Ugandan President
articles.content:
Message of Greeting from Ugandan President
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Yoweri Kaguta Museveni, president of the Republic of Uganda, on Feb. 11.
					 The message extended the warmest congratulations and greeting to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on his own behalf and on behalf of the government and people of Uganda on the occasion the 73rd birth anniversary of Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a powerful country in which all people are united through his devoted services for the people and achieved the great change in the development of social economy, it said.
					
					 The message hoped that the good bilateral relations with the government and people of the DPRK will continue to develop, highly appreciating the career and great exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It wished Kim Jong Un good health and the Korean people prosperity.

articles.title: Greetings from Equatorial Guinean Political Figure
articles.content:
Greetings from Equatorial Guinean Political Figure
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, received a message of greeting from Jeronimo Osa Osa Ecoro, general secretary of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea, on Feb. 12.
					 The message said all members and supporters of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea extend warm greetings to Kim Jong Un, and through him, to the WPK and the Korean people in the name of Obiang Nguema Mbasogo, founder and chairman of the party, on the occasion of the 73rd birth anniversary of HE Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK and eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 On the occasion of this significant day, we extend tribute to Kim Jong Il, the most outstanding leader of the Korean people, and hope that they will celebrate this day with splendor, the message added.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Service personnel of the people's army, working people of various strata and youth and schoolchildren laid floral baskets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the lunar New Year's Day, Juche 104 (2015).
					 Seen before the statues on Mansu Hill was a floral basket sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Laid before them were floral baskets in the name of the party, armed forces and power bodies, social organizations, ministries, national institutions, enterprises and factories at all levels, schools and others, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 The participants made a bow to the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Laid before the statues of the great Generalissimos at Kim Il Sung University, Kim Il Sung Military University, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, Ministry of People's Security, Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and the Mansudae Art Studio and portraits of their smiling images in various other places of the capital were floral baskets in the name of the units of the people's army, institutions, enterprises and others, and bouquets and flowers.
					
					 Service personnel of the people's army, working people, youth and schoolchildren visited the statues and portraits of smiling Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in their local areas to pay tributes to them.

articles.title: Samjiyon Band Gives Performance to Celebrate Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige la reunion ampliada del Buro Politico del CC de PTC
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en esta capital la reunion ampliada del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea bajo la direccion de Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Asistieron a la ocasion los miembros y los miembros suplentes del Buro Politico del CC del PTC.
					
					Tambien participaron como observadores los vicepremieres, los jefes y los primeros subjefes de departamento y los jefes de secciones correspondientes, del CC del PTC, los secretarios-jefe de los comites del PTC en las provincias y los funcionarios directivos de los ministerios, organos centrales, entidades de masas y organismos de las fuerzas armadas. 
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del PTC y eterno lider del partido y pueblo coreanos. 
					
					La reunion adopto la siguiente agenda:
					
					1. Para materializar cabalmente los legados del Dirigente Kim Jong Il tomandolos como eterna guia directriz de nuestro partido y revolucion.
					
					2. Problema de organizacion.
					
					Hubo debates del primer punto de la agenda.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae presento el informe sobre el primer punto de la agenda. 
					
					Los 3 anos pasados fueron el tiempo en que los militares y habitantes coreanos lucharon intensamente por materializar consecuentemente los legados del Dirigente Kim Jong Il bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, comenzo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					En esos dias de victorias y cambios se han demostrado a todo el mundo la gran fuerza atractiva y vital de la idea y causa del Dirigente.
					
					En los 3 anos pasados, se ha demostrado a todo el mundo el caracter eterno e invencible de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il y se han logrado exitos notables que hacen tener seguridad del futuro maravilloso de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					Esto es resultado de la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien cumple incondicional y consecuentemente los legados del Dirigente tomandolos como guia programatica.
					
					Se refirio a los defectos surgidos durante 3 anos pasados en las labores para materializar los legados del Dirigente y destaco la necesidad de registrar cambios trascendentales en las mismas al renovar radicalmente el punto de vista ideologico y el modo de trabajo.
					
					Pak Pong Ju, Ri Jae Il, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Chun Sop, Ri Man Gon y Jon Yong Nam intervinieron sobre el primer punto de la agenda.
					
					Ellos analizaron los exitos, defectos y lecciones obtenidos en los respectivos sectores y unidades en los trabajos de los ultimos 3 anos por hacer realidad los legados del Dirigente.
					
					En la reunion ampliada se aprobo la resolucion del primer punto de la agenda "Para materializar hasta el final los legados del gran camarada Kim Jong Il tomandolos como eterna guia directriz de nuestro partido y revolucion".
					
					La resolucion asevera que los legados del Dirigente, gran imagen de la potencia del monte Paektu y eterno lider del PTC y el pueblo coreano, constituyen el manual de la revolucion coreana, que aclara el camino a la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y la revolucion del Juche, y la guia programatica mas cientifica y enciclopedica.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un demuestra con sus acciones ejemplares como se debe acatar y hacer realidad los legados del Dirigente, apunta.
					
					Percatado de la conviccion y voluntad revolucionarias y el fuerte deseo del ejercito y pueblo coreanos, el Mariscal hizo enaltecer al Dirigente en los puestos cimeros del PTC y el Estado y acondicionar el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan como sagrado lugar del Juche, recuerda.
					
					Gracias al Mariscal, se levantaron las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en la colina Mansu, las capitales provinciales y las unidades importantes y se instalaron por doquier del pais las imagenes de los Generalisimos sonrientes, reitera el documento.   
					
					El Mariscal desenmascaro y castigo a los fraccionalistas modernos, que desafiaron a la direccion unica del Partido, transformo perfectamente toda la sociedad con la unica ideologia e hizo mas fuerte la unidad  monolitica con la noble concepcion del pueblo y de generaciones venideras de los grandes Generalisimos.
					
					Presento al Ejercito Popular como fidedigna patrulla y firme sosten, que apoya a la cabeza la causa revolucionaria de Songun del Partido y lo fortalecio como fuerte ejercito revolucionario del Monte Paektu, capaz de frustrar de inmediato cualesquier maniobras de provocacion de los enemigos, hizo levantar los objetos arquitectonicos de talla mundial mediante la cooperacion militar-civil y trajo la victoria brillante en la construccion de una potencia economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Hay que impulsar como la primordial la labor para materializar los legados del Dirigente y cumplirlo incondicionalmente y hasta el final sin desviacion ni un paso atras, ensena.
					
					Todas las organizaciones partidistas deben desplegar de manera concentrada la ofensiva ideo-politica para movilizar generalmente las fuerzas espirituales de las masas a la materializacion de los legados del Dirigente, asevera.
					
					Al concentrar toda la fuerza en el cumplimento de los legados del Dirigente, debemos establecer mas cabalmente el sistema de direccion unica del Mariscal y defender y glorificar las proezas de direccion del Partido, enfatiza.
					
					Es necesario cumplir incondicionalmente y hasta el final los legados del Dirigente hasta que aparezca su vitalidad en la realidad.
					
					La resolucion senala que los funcionarios, miembros directivos de la revolucion, deben ser abanderados y vanguardias en la ofensiva general por materializar los legados del Dirigente.
					
					Se refiere a la  necesidad de desarrollar una intensa lucha por erradicar el abuso del poder, el burocratismo y los actos ilegales y corruptos.
					
					Se exigira a los funcionarios considerar como etica de la revolucion y modo de partido revolucionario luchar con abnegacion por el partido, la revolucion, la sociedad y el colectivo y trabajar y vivir con honradez y honestidad como deseaba el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, apunto.
					
					Teniendo bien presente el noble proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien dedica todo lo suyo al partido, los funcionarios deben consagrarse para resolver los problemas surgidos en la vida poblacional y los otros que aquejan al pueblo, enfatizo.
					
					Por ultimo, exigio a las organizaciones del partido y las instituciones politicas a todos niveles, el Consejo de Ministros y otros organismos correspondientes que realicen las labores organizativas y politicas y tomen las medidas administrativas para materializar la resolucion del Buro Politico del CC del PTC.
					
					La reunion ampliada discutio el problema de organizacion, segundo punto de la agenda.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un pronuncio un historico discurso resumen.
					
					La reunion, sesionada en un periodo historico de la revolucion coreana, hizo balance de los exitos logrados en el esfuerzo por materializar los legados del Dirigente, los defectos y experiencias surgidos en esta labor, senalo y agrego que  la reunion abordo y decidio los temas importantes que se presentan en hacer realidad los legados del Dirigente.
					
					Materializar hasta el final y sin retroceder ni un paso los legados del Dirigente  y realizar en esta tierra su proposito y deseo es la firme voluntad de nuestros militares y habitantes, enfatizo.
					
					Prosiguio que en la actualidad, nuestro partido, ejercito y pueblo tienen el importante y sagrado deber de desplegar una dinamica lucha por cumplir la historica causa de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y reunificar la patria sosteniendo en alto la bandera de kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo para  anticipar la victoria final de la revolucion coreana.
					
					Dijo que  deben trabajar segun el proposito del Dirigente tomando como guia programatica sus legados, siendo soldados y discipulos del Dirigente 
					
					Acoto que todas las organizaciones partidistas deben poner en orden todas las ensenanzas e indicaciones del Dirigente dadas a los respectivos sectores y unidades y hacer que los funcionarios y trabajadores las asimilen profundamente para que esten al tanto de los legados del Dirigente.
					
					  A traves de la labor politica fresca y dinamica que haga sentir los alientos de la epoca, hay que incentivar el entusiasmo de las masas, de modo que reinen en todo el pais el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y el del viento cortante del Paektu y se levante la oleada de creaciones e innovaciones en todos los centros de trabajo, instruyo.
					
					 Prosiguio que deben ser abanderadas en esas labores las unidades donde estan registradas las hazanas de guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					   El legado mas importante y deseo de toda la vida del Dirigente estuvieron en hacer llevar al pueblo una vida acomodada y feliz, acoto.
					
					  Propuso cumplir primero los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il referentes a los problemas de alimentos y vestidos del pueblo.
					
					  Los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado y otros funcionarios deben reflexionar con conciencia si han trabajado en sus importantes cargos dados por el partido segun la voluntad del Dirigente y conforme a la demanda e intereses de la revolucion y luchar con la decision y pasion extraordinarias por materializar consecuentemente los legados del Dirigente y las politicas del partido, apunto.
					
					  Senalo que no pocos funcionarios como los de organos de direccion economica son faltos de responsabilidad y trabajan ahora sin la conciencia de que son autores de las gestiones economicas.
					
					  Los funcionarios deben idear con novedad todos los trabajos y desarrollarlos de manera innovadora ateniendose a las condiciones reales de hoy y previendo el nivel mundial, enseno.
					
					  Prosiguio que ellos deben trabajar y vivir con conciencia limpia siendo honrados y honestos.
					
					  Cuando cada sector y unidad se proponga algun trabajo, ha de meditar bien si hay algun factor o elemento que perjudique las demandas e intereses del pueblo y organizarlo en el principio de no causar ninguna carga o incomodidad a los habitantes, dijo.
					
					  No hay nada imposible ni meta inalcanzable ya que contamos con el maravilloso proyecto de construccion de una patria prospera presentado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y con la pasion revolucionaria y las fuerzas inagotables de todos los militares y habitantes levantados como gigantes con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu aceptando el llamamiento del partido, destaco.
					
					  Hoy dia, los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus satelites estan desesperados para frenar nuestro avance, pero la revolucion coreana marcha adelante siguiendo la hoja de ruta a la victoria, fijada por el partido, apunto.
					
					  Con gran fe en la victoria, todos deben producir viraje revolucionario en la lucha por cumplir los legados del Dirigente Kim Jong Il ateniendose al espiritu de la reunion ampliada del BP del CC del PTC, exhorto.

articles.title: DPRK People Enjoy Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
DPRK People Enjoy Lunar New Year's Day
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The people of the DPRK are enjoying the Lunar New Year's Day. 
					 Festive mood pervades the streets of Pyongyang and local cities, decorated with colorful flags, pictures conveying New Year greetings, celebrating lanterns, etc.
					
					 Many people visit the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and mosaics depicting their smiling images in different parts of the country to pay tribute to them.
					
					 Juniors are making New Year's call to seniors and teachers.
					
					 Squares and plazas in Pyongyang and local cities are crowded with school children playing folklore games, including rope-skipping, shuttlecock and kite-flying.
					
					 Seen in parks and resting-places are people playing Janggi (Korean chess) and yut-game.
					
					 Restaurants are serving festival dishes like rice-cake soup and glutinous rice-cake on the Lunar New Year's Day.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses Park Geun Hye of Taking Issue with DPRK's Social System
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Park Geun Hye of Taking Issue with DPRK's Social System
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet chief executive suddenly convened a meeting of chairmen of the "Committee for Preparations for Unification" at Chongwadae on Feb. 16 at which she again raised the sinister "doctrine of gaining a great opportunity of unification." She worked hard to shift the blame for the failure of opening the inter-Korean dialogue onto the DPRK, claiming the north is setting forth a "series of preconditions" and the like and there is "no response." She hurt even the lines and policies pursued by the DPRK and dignified social system chosen by it while talking about the "wave of change" and "reform and opening" based on such miser-like logic as "security is provided by thick purse, not by nukes."
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This is an unpardonable politically-motivated provocation against the sincere efforts of the DPRK for improving the inter-Korean relations and desire of all the Koreans.
					
					 The puppet authorities' charge against the just stand of the DPRK for dialogue and its inviolable social system clearly proves their inveterate hostility toward the DPRK and an attempt to escalate confrontation with it, the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 The puppet authorities' invectives are aimed to curry favor with the U.S. and realize at any cost their dream of escalating confrontation between social systems through tightened nexus with their American master.
					
					 Park's imprudent lip-service is a snag lying in the way of improving the inter-Korean relations and the root cause of misfortune.
					
					 She had better hold her tongue, clearly understanding the catastrophic consequences to be entailed by her reckless remarks inciting confrontation between the north and the south.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Repeal of SL in S. Korea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Repeal of SL in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The decades-long history of the "Security Law" (SL) in south Korea is stained with blood shed by innocent people and intertwined with grave crimes of escalating the distrust and conflict between the north and the south and laying a big obstacle in the way of achieving national unity and reunification.
					 Rodong Sinmun Thursday says this in an article, calling for its repeal.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The SL has become a pronoun of horror in south Korea, the mere mention of which makes even children shudder with horror.
					
					 It was enforced more fiercely during the tenure of Lee Myung Bak, heinous dictator, and after the present chief executive, daughter of the "yusin" dictatorship, came to power. According to the preliminary data, hundreds of people were arrested by the police on charges of the violation of the SL from 2010 to July last year. More than 206,400 articles were deleted from 2009 to August last year for the mere reason that they were contrary to the SL.
					
					 The south Korean people are trembling with anger over the reckless acts of the present ruling forces who mercilessly trampled down the bud of democratization that the south Korean people had attained through protracted self-sacrificing struggle, and turned south Korea into the tundra of human rights and the theatre of fascist crackdown.
					
					 What merits a more serious attention is that the puppet group labeled the just activities of the pro-reunification and patriotic forces as acts following the north and mercilessly cracked down on them, pushing even the north-south relations to a catastrophe.
					
					 It is shame of the nation and misfortune of the south Korean people that the medieval evil law such as the SL still exists in south Korea in the present age of civilization.
					
					 The ill-famed, horrible and criminal history of the SL must be ended without delay.

articles.title: Actions against SL Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Actions against SL Called for in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The Civic and Social Measure Committee for Checking Suppression under Pretext of Security in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on Feb. 12, calling for the repeal of the "Security Law" (SL), fascist law, according to south Korean internet newspaper Jaju Minbo.
					 At the rally the victims of the SL denounced the puppet authorities' vicious racket for suppression.
					
					 They called for turning out in the action for the repeal of the SL in unity.
					
					 They demanded immediate stop to suppression under the pretext of security, accusing Park Geun Hye regime of labeling the forces for independent reunification as the "forces following the north."
					
					 They declared to fight against the forces kicking up the row about "followers of the north."

articles.title: S. Korean Police Arrest Resident Praising DPRK
articles.content:
S. Korean Police Arrest Resident Praising DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet police arrested a resident who praised the DPRK on charges of the violation of the "Security Law", according to a south Korean internet newspaper on Feb. 13.
					 The puppet Seoul Police Agency committed such violence for the mere reason that he made "products benefiting the enemy" and posted them on websites such as Jaju Minbo.
					
					 He opened the website since 2010 and has posted on it articles and files praising the socialist system in the DPRK where its people are enjoying a genuine life as masters of society.
					
					 He has continued the activities through internet despite the puppet authorities' suppression.

articles.title: US Blamed for Blocking Improvement of North-South Relations
articles.content:
US Blamed for Blocking Improvement of North-South Relations
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification in south Korea held the 185th peace action for national reunification before the U.S. embassy in Seoul on Tuesday.
					 The organization said the favorite climate of mending the inter-Korean relations was created at the beginning of the year but the U.S. vitiated it by imposing sanctions on the north and insisting on "dismantlement of nukes by the north first".
					
					 It denounced the U.S. for working hard to make a fait accompli the deployment of THAAD in south Korea.
					
					 It disclosed that this is attributable to the U.S. sinister intention for hegemony in Northeast Asia.
					
					 Saying that the authorities should put an end to the history of the confrontation between the south and the north and advance to the national reunification, the organization called on them to turn out in pursuing the independent south-north relations undeterred by the pressure of the foreign forces.

articles.title: Korean in Russia Supports Statement of DPRK NDC
articles.content:
Korean in Russia Supports Statement of DPRK NDC
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Kim Kyong Ryol, vice-chairman of the Central Association of Korean Nationals in Russia, made public a statement on Feb. 7 in support of the statement issued by the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK.
					 As military pressure, isolation and blockade did not work on the DPRK, the U.S. raised the non-existent "human rights issue" and unreasonably linked the hacking at Sony Pictures Entertainment with the DPRK, slapping "additional sanctions" against it, he said, denouncing Obama for crying out for "pulling down the north" through cyber warfare.
					
					 He fully supported the statement of the DPRK NDC as most just and aboveboard.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Obama had better behave himself, clearly understanding the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people are the heroic people who have registered only victories in the stand-off with the U.S. imperialists. They have single-minded unity and invincible treasured sword bolstered up by dint of Songun.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy has already been frustrated.
					
					 He urged the U.S. to make a bold policy switchover.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreigners
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Foreigners
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of leader Kim Jong Il took place by the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo and the Unido Azidharma Industrial Company of Indonesia between February 5 and 10.
					 Displayed at the venues of the seminars were photos showing exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were works of peerlessly great men and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Speakers including the president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism lauded Kim Jong Il as an outstanding statesman who led the Juche-oriented Songun revolutionary cause along the road of one victory after another with profound ideology and theory and wise guidance and a peerless Songun brilliant commander who turned the DPRK into an invincible military power capable of smashing any strong enemies at a single blow.
					
					 They praised him for developing the Juche idea into the great guiding idea of the era of independence and indicating the way ahead of the human cause of independence.
					
					 The chairman of the Youth Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in Democratic Congo said that Kim Jong Il was a genuine leader of the people who devoted all his life to the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche and the happiness of the people.
					
					 The director of the Unido Azidharma Industrial Company of Indonesia said that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will always live along with the prosperous socialist Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Praised by Figure of Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Praised by Figure of Ecuador
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A national meeting, film show and book exhibition took place in Quito on February 10 under the sponsorship of the Ecuadorian national preparatory committee for celebrating the 73rd birth anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venue of the event were immortal works of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Participants watched the Korean film "The Country I Saw".
					
					 Milton Burbano Bohorquez, chairman of the Ecuadorian Cultural Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea who is secretary general of the preparatory committee, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il turned the DPRK into a political power based on the single-minded unity of the leader, party and the masses and a military power equipped with nuclear deterrent.
					
					 He made the forced march of field guidance day and night for the prosperity of the country and happiness of its people until the last moments of his life.
					
					 His sacred revolutionary career and the undying exploits will be handed down to posterity.
					
					 The Korean people will surely achieve final victory in the struggle for building a thriving nation and achieving national reunification as Kim Jong Un is firmly carrying forward the cause of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the just cause of the Korean people.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Nigeria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Nigeria
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A joint meeting, Korean book exhibition and film show took place on February 11 under the sponsorship of the Nigerian national preparatory committee for celebrating the 73rd birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed at the venue of the event were photos showing the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il and the revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were photos showing the struggle of the army and people all out in the general offensive to hasten final victory in the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Participants watched the Korean film documenting the invincible might of Songun Korea.
					
					 Chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism Alhassan Mamman Muhammad who is also secretary general of the preparatory committee said in his speech:
					
					 Kim Jong Il's life was a noble life of total dedication to the bright future of the country and the people.
					
					 He provided ceaseless field guidance for the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people.
					
					 The course of the field guidance covered by him all his life is equivalent to going round the earth nearly 17 times and he visited more than 14,290 units.
					
					 The noble image of Kim Jong Il will shine forever in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the progressives as he devoted his all to the motherland and the people.
					
					 A message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Il Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Events took place at the DPRK missions abroad to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Reception, book and photo exhibition, film show and other celebrations took place at the DPRK missions in Russia, Indonesia, Cambodia, Uzbekistan, the Czech Republic, Germany, Switzerland, Sweden and Nigeria from Jan. 31 to Feb. 12.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos documenting feats of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On show were works of the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu, books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 Films shown included "Fireworks of a Thriving Nation", "Munsu Water Park".
					
					 The first vice mayor of Nakhodka City of Russia said that responsibility for the destiny of the country and the nation and patriotism ran through the whole life of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The first deputy prime minister of Khabarovsk Territory Administration of Russia hoped that bigger successes would be achieved in the development of the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries this year, a year of Russia-DPRK friendship.
					
					 The chairman of the Committee for Founding the Sukarno Education Foundation of Indonesia said that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il paid deep attention to the development of the friendly relations between the two countries.
					
					 The former general secretary of the Central Committee of the Czechoslovak Communist Party praised Kim Jong Il as a great man who put the unity and cohesion among the leader, party and the masses on a high level.
					
					 The chairman of the Communist Party of Germany said that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to the people's happiness, Korea's reunification and world peace and security all his life.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Russian Figures
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Russian Figures
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- A celebration meeting took place in Sankt-Peterburg of Russia, an opening ceremony of a Korean photo, book and handicrafts exhibition in a city of Moscow region and a film show and seminar by the Friendship Association with Foreign Countries of Khabarovsk Territory of Russia between February 8 and 12 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed at the venues of events were photos showing immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Exhibited there were works of peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu and photos and books introducing Songun Korea and handicrafts associated with the wisdom and talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Participants watched the Korean film documenting the Songun revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The director of the Russian Institute of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said in his speech:
					
					 Kim Jong Il was born in the secret camp on Mt. Paektu.
					
					 He led the do-or-die struggle of the Korean people for defending socialism.
					
					 So, the DPRK could defend the destiny of the country and the nation as well as socialism despite all sorts of trials and difficulties and work the miracle of opening a radical turn in the building of a thriving nation.
					
					 The chairperson of a city cultural committee of Moscow region said that Kim Jong Il was a great leader who not only turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power but also provided a solid foundation for building an economic power with his outstanding leadership.
					
					 The vice chairman of the Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Khabarovsk Territory said:
					
					 The film helped me deeply feel the validity of the Songun politics.
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to the development of the Russia-DPRK friendly relations.
					
					 The bilateral friendship developed by him will grow stronger amid deep concern of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: US "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK Denounced
articles.content:
US "Human Rights" Racket against DPRK Denounced
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- E. A. Vidyasekera, coordinating secretary of the Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization, made public a statement on February 12 in denunciation of the U.S. "human rights" racket against the DPRK. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization expresses disgust at the U.S. propaganda about "human rights abuses in the DPRK". 
					
					 The U.S. perpetrated continuous human rights abuses against other countries while referring to the UN Human Rights Council the "human rights issue in the DPRK" fabricated by it.
					
					 A "defector from the north" confessed that he committed a perjury such as the "human rights abuses in the DPRK".
					
					 The Afro-Asian People's Solidarity Organization held that it is time for the U.S. to retract its improper attitude toward the DPRK, treat other countries in a civilized way and correct its mistakes.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Brazilian Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted by Brazilian Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, February 19 (KCNA) -- Marshal Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Expedite the Construction of the Livestock Breeding Base in the Sepho Area and Bring about a New Turn in Developing Animal Husbandry" was posted by the Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on February 11.
					 The work, made public on January 28, Juche 104 (2015) clarifies the idea that it is imperative to solve food problem by developing stock-breeding and fisheries while doing farming well, and indicates tasks and ways to be fulfilled in developing animal husbandry.
					
					 The homepage carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige la reunion ampliada del Buro Politico del CC de PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige la reunion ampliada del Buro Politico del CC de PTC
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 18 en esta capital la reunion ampliada del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea bajo la direccion de Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					Asistieron a la ocasion los miembros y los miembros suplentes del Buro Politico del CC del PTC.
					
					Tambien participaron como observadores los vicepremieres, los jefes y los primeros subjefes de departamento y los jefes de secciones correspondientes, del CC del PTC, los secretarios-jefe de los comites del PTC en las provincias y los funcionarios directivos de los ministerios, organos centrales, entidades de masas y organismos de las fuerzas armadas. 
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio en memoria del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del PTC y eterno lider del partido y pueblo coreanos. 
					
					La reunion adopto la siguiente agenda:
					
					1. Para materializar cabalmente los legados del Dirigente Kim Jong Il tomandolos como eterna guia directriz de nuestro partido y revolucion.
					
					2. Problema de organizacion.
					
					Hubo debates del primer punto de la agenda.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae presento el informe sobre el primer punto de la agenda. 
					
					Los 3 anos pasados fueron el tiempo en que los militares y habitantes coreanos lucharon intensamente por materializar consecuentemente los legados del Dirigente Kim Jong Il bajo la guia del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, comenzo el orador y prosiguio:
					
					En esos dias de victorias y cambios se han demostrado a todo el mundo la gran fuerza atractiva y vital de la idea y causa del Dirigente.
					
					En los 3 anos pasados, se ha demostrado a todo el mundo el caracter eterno e invencible de la nacion de Kim Il Sung y la Corea de Kim Jong Il y se han logrado exitos notables que hacen tener seguridad del futuro maravilloso de la potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					Esto es resultado de la sabia direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien cumple incondicional y consecuentemente los legados del Dirigente tomandolos como guia programatica.
					
					Se refirio a los defectos surgidos durante 3 anos pasados en las labores para materializar los legados del Dirigente y destaco la necesidad de registrar cambios trascendentales en las mismas al renovar radicalmente el punto de vista ideologico y el modo de trabajo.
					
					Pak Pong Ju, Ri Jae Il, Hyon Yong Chol, Kim Chun Sop, Ri Man Gon y Jon Yong Nam intervinieron sobre el primer punto de la agenda.
					
					Ellos analizaron los exitos, defectos y lecciones obtenidos en los respectivos sectores y unidades en los trabajos de los ultimos 3 anos por hacer realidad los legados del Dirigente.
					
					En la reunion ampliada se aprobo la resolucion del primer punto de la agenda "Para materializar hasta el final los legados del gran camarada Kim Jong Il tomandolos como eterna guia directriz de nuestro partido y revolucion".
					
					La resolucion asevera que los legados del Dirigente, gran imagen de la potencia del monte Paektu y eterno lider del PTC y el pueblo coreano, constituyen el manual de la revolucion coreana, que aclara el camino a la victoria final de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y la revolucion del Juche, y la guia programatica mas cientifica y enciclopedica.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un demuestra con sus acciones ejemplares como se debe acatar y hacer realidad los legados del Dirigente, apunta.
					
					Percatado de la conviccion y voluntad revolucionarias y el fuerte deseo del ejercito y pueblo coreanos, el Mariscal hizo enaltecer al Dirigente en los puestos cimeros del PTC y el Estado y acondicionar el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan como sagrado lugar del Juche, recuerda.
					
					Gracias al Mariscal, se levantaron las estatuas de bronce del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il en la colina Mansu, las capitales provinciales y las unidades importantes y se instalaron por doquier del pais las imagenes de los Generalisimos sonrientes, reitera el documento.   
					
					El Mariscal desenmascaro y castigo a los fraccionalistas modernos, que desafiaron a la direccion unica del Partido, transformo perfectamente toda la sociedad con la unica ideologia e hizo mas fuerte la unidad  monolitica con la noble concepcion del pueblo y de generaciones venideras de los grandes Generalisimos.
					
					Presento al Ejercito Popular como fidedigna patrulla y firme sosten, que apoya a la cabeza la causa revolucionaria de Songun del Partido y lo fortalecio como fuerte ejercito revolucionario del Monte Paektu, capaz de frustrar de inmediato cualesquier maniobras de provocacion de los enemigos, hizo levantar los objetos arquitectonicos de talla mundial mediante la cooperacion militar-civil y trajo la victoria brillante en la construccion de una potencia economica y la mejora de la vida del pueblo.
					
					Hay que impulsar como la primordial la labor para materializar los legados del Dirigente y cumplirlo incondicionalmente y hasta el final sin desviacion ni un paso atras, ensena.
					
					Todas las organizaciones partidistas deben desplegar de manera concentrada la ofensiva ideo-politica para movilizar generalmente las fuerzas espirituales de las masas a la materializacion de los legados del Dirigente, asevera.
					
					Al concentrar toda la fuerza en el cumplimento de los legados del Dirigente, debemos establecer mas cabalmente el sistema de direccion unica del Mariscal y defender y glorificar las proezas de direccion del Partido, enfatiza.
					
					Es necesario cumplir incondicionalmente y hasta el final los legados del Dirigente hasta que aparezca su vitalidad en la realidad.
					
					La resolucion senala que los funcionarios, miembros directivos de la revolucion, deben ser abanderados y vanguardias en la ofensiva general por materializar los legados del Dirigente.
					
					Se refiere a la  necesidad de desarrollar una intensa lucha por erradicar el abuso del poder, el burocratismo y los actos ilegales y corruptos.
					
					Se exigira a los funcionarios considerar como etica de la revolucion y modo de partido revolucionario luchar con abnegacion por el partido, la revolucion, la sociedad y el colectivo y trabajar y vivir con honradez y honestidad como deseaba el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, apunto.
					
					Teniendo bien presente el noble proposito del Mariscal Kim Jong Un quien dedica todo lo suyo al partido, los funcionarios deben consagrarse para resolver los problemas surgidos en la vida poblacional y los otros que aquejan al pueblo, enfatizo.
					
					Por ultimo, exigio a las organizaciones del partido y las instituciones politicas a todos niveles, el Consejo de Ministros y otros organismos correspondientes que realicen las labores organizativas y politicas y tomen las medidas administrativas para materializar la resolucion del Buro Politico del CC del PTC.
					
					La reunion ampliada discutio el problema de organizacion, segundo punto de la agenda.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un pronuncio un historico discurso resumen.
					
					La reunion, sesionada en un periodo historico de la revolucion coreana, hizo balance de los exitos logrados en el esfuerzo por materializar los legados del Dirigente, los defectos y experiencias surgidos en esta labor, senalo y agrego que  la reunion abordo y decidio los temas importantes que se presentan en hacer realidad los legados del Dirigente.
					
					Materializar hasta el final y sin retroceder ni un paso los legados del Dirigente  y realizar en esta tierra su proposito y deseo es la firme voluntad de nuestros militares y habitantes, enfatizo.
					
					Prosiguio que en la actualidad, nuestro partido, ejercito y pueblo tienen el importante y sagrado deber de desplegar una dinamica lucha por cumplir la historica causa de construccion de un Estado prospero socialista y reunificar la patria sosteniendo en alto la bandera de kimilsungismo-kimjongilismo para  anticipar la victoria final de la revolucion coreana.
					
					Dijo que  deben trabajar segun el proposito del Dirigente tomando como guia programatica sus legados, siendo soldados y discipulos del Dirigente 
					
					Acoto que todas las organizaciones partidistas deben poner en orden todas las ensenanzas e indicaciones del Dirigente dadas a los respectivos sectores y unidades y hacer que los funcionarios y trabajadores las asimilen profundamente para que esten al tanto de los legados del Dirigente.
					
					  A traves de la labor politica fresca y dinamica que haga sentir los alientos de la epoca, hay que incentivar el entusiasmo de las masas, de modo que reinen en todo el pais el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu y el del viento cortante del Paektu y se levante la oleada de creaciones e innovaciones en todos los centros de trabajo, instruyo.
					
					 Prosiguio que deben ser abanderadas en esas labores las unidades donde estan registradas las hazanas de guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					
					   El legado mas importante y deseo de toda la vida del Dirigente estuvieron en hacer llevar al pueblo una vida acomodada y feliz, acoto.
					
					  Propuso cumplir primero los legados del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il referentes a los problemas de alimentos y vestidos del pueblo.
					
					  Los cuadros directivos del partido y el Estado y otros funcionarios deben reflexionar con conciencia si han trabajado en sus importantes cargos dados por el partido segun la voluntad del Dirigente y conforme a la demanda e intereses de la revolucion y luchar con la decision y pasion extraordinarias por materializar consecuentemente los legados del Dirigente y las politicas del partido, apunto.
					
					  Senalo que no pocos funcionarios como los de organos de direccion economica son faltos de responsabilidad y trabajan ahora sin la conciencia de que son autores de las gestiones economicas.
					
					  Los funcionarios deben idear con novedad todos los trabajos y desarrollarlos de manera innovadora ateniendose a las condiciones reales de hoy y previendo el nivel mundial, enseno.
					
					  Prosiguio que ellos deben trabajar y vivir con conciencia limpia siendo honrados y honestos.
					
					  Cuando cada sector y unidad se proponga algun trabajo, ha de meditar bien si hay algun factor o elemento que perjudique las demandas e intereses del pueblo y organizarlo en el principio de no causar ninguna carga o incomodidad a los habitantes, dijo.
					
					  No hay nada imposible ni meta inalcanzable ya que contamos con el maravilloso proyecto de construccion de una patria prospera presentado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y con la pasion revolucionaria y las fuerzas inagotables de todos los militares y habitantes levantados como gigantes con el espiritu revolucionario del Paektu aceptando el llamamiento del partido, destaco.
					
					  Hoy dia, los imperialistas norteamericanos y sus satelites estan desesperados para frenar nuestro avance, pero la revolucion coreana marcha adelante siguiendo la hoja de ruta a la victoria, fijada por el partido, apunto.
					
					  Con gran fe en la victoria, todos deben producir viraje revolucionario en la lucha por cumplir los legados del Dirigente Kim Jong Il ateniendose al espiritu de la reunion ampliada del BP del CC del PTC, exhorto.

articles.title: Banda Samjiyon ofrece funcion por el Ano Nuevo Lunar
articles.content:
Banda Samjiyon ofrece funcion por el Ano Nuevo Lunar
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Se ofrecio el dia 19 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo la funcion de la Banda Samjiyon del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae por el Ano Nuevo Lunar.
					La disfrutaron los trabajadores capitalinos y los jovenes y estudiantes.
					
					En la escena, iniciada con el trio mixto "Campanazo", se interpretaron el solo masculino "Es maravilloso nuestro futuro", el solo femenino "Jubilo del pueblo", el cuarteto masculino "Directo", el cuarteto mixto "Cancion de la muchacha", entre otras piezas.
					
					Los cantantes describieron en sus piezas que bajo la direccion del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, continua la gloriosa historia de la Corea de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea brilla como potencia del monte Paektu.
					
					Se escucharon tambien el solo femenino folklorico "Cancion de abundante pesca en el mar", el solo masculino "Que se vaya el tiempo", y las musicas extranjeras.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun rechaza la acusacion de Park Geun-hye al regimen de la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun rechaza la acusacion de Park Geun-hye al regimen de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- El dia 16, la mandataria surcoreana convoco de repente en Chongwadae la llamada reunion de los presidentes del "comite preparatorio de unificacion".
					En esa ocasion, volvio a plantear la doctrina de "Thong-il Taebak" (cajon de tesoros para la unificacion) y trato de imputar a la RPDC las responsabilidades de la no apertura del dialogo entre ambas partes coreanas, diciendo que el Norte "no hace nada mas que enumerar las condiciones" y "no responde". 
					
					Partiendo de su logica de comerciante avara,  dijo que la "seguridad no se consigue con armas nucleares sino con la bolsa llena".
					
					Ademas, se atrevio a calumniar la linea, la politica y el digno regimen, optados por la RPDC, usando expresiones como "oleada de cambios" y "reforma y apertura".
					
					Su chismografia significa imperdonable provocacion politica que contraviene a los sinceros esfuerzos de la RPDC por mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y al deseo de toda la nacion coreana.
					
					Asi condena el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 19 y prosigue:
					
					Al cuestionar la justa posicion de la RPDC sobre el dialogo y el sagrado regimen de ella, la mandataria surcoreana expuso claramente su incambiable hostilidad e intento de enfrentarse con la parte connacional.
					
					Asi ella quiso adular a Estados Unidos y realizar a toda costa su ambicion de enfrentar los regimenes de ambas partes coreanas intensificando la confabulacion con su amo gringo.
					
					El imprudente acto verbal de Park es un serio obstaculo para las relaciones N-S y el factor de desgracias.
					
					Ella debe tener cuidado con su lengua al darse cuenta de las consecuencias catastroficas de sus palabras que fomentan el enfrentamiento fratricida N-S.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun exige poner fin a historia criminal de la "ley de seguridad" del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun exige poner fin a historia criminal de la "ley de seguridad" del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 19 de febrero (ACNC) -- Varias decadas de vigencia de la "ley de seguridad" en el Sur de Corea son una historia manchada de sangre de habitantes inocentes y de crimenes como agravar la desconfianza y confrontacion entre ambas partes coreanas y obstaculizar seriamente la unidad nacional y la reunificacion de la patria.
					Asi insiste el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado el dia 19 y continua:
					
					Hasta los ninos surcoreanos se sienten horrorizados solo con escuchar la palabra "ley de seguridad".
					
					Ese codigo se hizo mas infame y furioso durante el mandato del connotado dictador Lee Myung Bak y de la actual mandataria, hija del tirano de "Yusin". 
					
					Segun estadisticas preliminares, desde el 2010 hasta julio del ano pasado, cientos de personas fueron detenidas por la policia bajo las sospechas de violacion de esa ley. 
					
					En virtud de la misma, fueron cancelados en Internet mas de 206 mil 400 articulos desde 2009 hasta agosto del ano pasado.
					
					Ahora, los habitantes surcoreanos vibran de indignacion por la conducta de las actuales fuerzas gobernantes que pisotearon la semilla de democratizacion, lograda a cambio de una larga lucha de sacrificio, y convirtieron el suelo surcoreano en la tierra privada de derechos humanos y en el escenario de represion fascista.
					
					Lo mas problematico es que la banda titere surcoreana lleva las relaciones intercoreanas a la fase catastrofica reprimiendo cruelmente a las fuerzas patrioticas pro-reunificacion calificandolas de "seguidoras al Norte (de Corea)".
					
					La existencia de esa ley medieval en la epoca civilizada de hoy es una verguenza de la nacion y gran desgracia para los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					Hay que poner fin ahora mismo a la historia criminal de la "ley de seguridad".
